page.title: 18Living in a Country Village.
page.content: We like living in this area because it is quiet and is not near any large noisy factories.It is close to several towns where we can buy food and clothes.We have no major roads.We have no pollution problem.We can attend the local nursery and primary schools and at 11 yrs of age we only have 4 miles to travel to Staindrop Secondary School.We can also go to cubs,scouts, brownies and youth club as well as Sunday School.We have a Chapel and Church in Cockfield.There is a recreation ground for football,bowls, cricket and tennis.We have a play park with a slide,swings and climbing frame.A small branch libary opens each Wednesday.The fell is a useful and enjoyable open space which allows more than the average number of children to have a horse to ride.We would not like to live in a town or city.
